text:
Why didn't get_dummies in pandas library or OneHotEncoder in scikit-learn library be used for one-hot encoding? I know OneHotEncoder is the most common and useful. One-hot coding can also be done using the eye or identity components of the NumPy library.
M.Sari
OneHotEncoder has the option to output a row column tuple matrix. DictVectorizer is a one step method to encode and support row column tuple matrix output.
Harinder(sudwalh@gmail.com)
